about.mission: To provide music lovers a one-stop destination that allows them to enjoy and share their favorite songs.
about.history: Founded by Dan Chui in 2023, Flow is a music app that allows you to listen to your favorite songs both online & offline, organize music files, customize your music-listening experience and more. Go with the Flow!
